title: Jim Cramer: Misinformation About Ditched Montana Meeting Serves No One Well
text:
What really happened on Friday with the Chinese and Montana? Why did it come out that the Chinese cancelled the meeting with farmers in Bozeman when it actually was Treasury Secretary Mnuchin, as we learned on Monday in an awkward press conference with the president? If you roll back the tape, the Dow Jones Industrial Average was up about 25 point...

description: Jim Cramer said it is hard to figure what Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin hoped to gain by leaving the impression that the Chinese, and not the U.S., cancelled a meeting with Montana farmers.
authors: Misinformation About Ditched Montana Meeting Serves No One Well
It'S Hard To Figure What Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin Hoped To Gain Leaving The Impression That The Chinese Cancelled A Meeting With Montana Farmers.
